song.title: Acoustical Blues
song.info:
Comments by The Zapper! :
* Acoustical Blues * Composed and Tracked By: The Zapper! of Force Ten
Here's a good one for you, it's sounds so realistic! I sampled and played that cool guitar riff myself, using a Shure SM/57 with a Fender Acoustic 12Strings. Thanks to the author of JIMI.MOD for those GREAT Hammond Sounds! Drums are by me too... It's groovy, it's cool. I'll drink the milk of paradise... I've heard the wisper tales of immortality. Time and man alone, XANADU. Later Guyz. (Like Vizz) Cut...
